name: Agora sim, que mataram o meu Besouro
lyrics:
Agora sim, que mataram o meu Besouro
Depois de morto, Besourinho cordão de ouro

Agora sim, que mataram o meu Besouro
Depois de morto, Besourinho cordão de ouro

Besouro Besourinho

Coro: Cordão de Ouro

Besouro Besourinho

Cordão de Ouro

translations.text:
Now that they killed my Beetle
After being killed, Besourinho gold chain

Now that they killed my Beetle
After being killed, Besourinho gold cord

Beetle Beetle

Gold chain

Beetle Beetle

Gold chain

Most, hogy megölték a Bogaram
Miután megölték, Besourinho aranylánc

Most, hogy megölték a Bogaram
Miután megölték, Besourinho aranyzsinór

Bogár Bogár

Aranylánc

Bogár Bogár

Aranylánc
